mapper.insert: insert into industrial_value_add (ID, STAT_YEAR, STATUS, INSERT_TIME, VALUE_ADD, VALUE_RATE, SCALE_VALUE_ADD, SCALE_VALUE_RATE, PROVINCES_RATE, COUNTRY_RATE, org_no) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{valueAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valueRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scaleValueAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scaleValueRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provincesRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgNo,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update industrial_value_add
STAT_YEAR = #{statYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VALUE_ADD = #{valueAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALUE_RATE = #{valueRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCALE_VALUE_ADD = #{scaleValueAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCALE_VALUE_RATE = #{scaleValueRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCES_RATE = #{provincesRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTRY_RATE = #{countryRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_no = #{orgNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update industrial_value_add set STAT_YEAR = #{statYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VALUE_ADD = #{valueAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALUE_RATE = #{valueRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCALE_VALUE_ADD = #{scaleValueAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCALE_VALUE_RATE = #{scaleValueRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCES_RATE = #{provincesRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRY_RATE = #{countryRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_no = #{orgNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
STATUS=2
AND STAT_YEAR >= #{startTime}
AND #{endTime} >= STAT_YEAR
order by STAT_YEAR
